title: The default value in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. <Please provide details of what the user observes in this step.>
OB: After modifying the default value of a report parameter, the list box should retain the modified default value.
EB: After modifying the default value of a report parameter, the list box is not retaining the modified default value.
SR: The list box of the report parameter should correctly retain the modified default value.
